item.title: Why Your Website Is Not Accepted by Google AdSense?
item.description: Getting approved for Google AdSense can be a bit of a mystery, especially if you’ve already poured your heart and soul into your website. If you’ve been rejected, it’s frustrating—but it’s also a chance to understand what went wrong and how to fix it. Here are some common reasons why your site might not have made the cut, along with a few lesser-known factors that could be at play.
item.dc:creator: Otra Suinegue
